aspecttable.name: Southern 1981
aspecttable.reference: As described by the signal chart found at http://www.railroadsignals.us/rulebooks/sr81/sr81.htm which are reported as the 1981 edition.

aspect.name: Approach Diverging
aspect.indication: Proceed, approaching next signal prepared to take diverging route.

aspect.name: Advance Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed, preparing to stop at second signal.

aspect.name: Diverging Route Clear (Medium)
aspect.indication: Proceed through diverging route, observing authorized speed through turnout(s) or crossover(s).

aspect.name: Diverging Route Clear (Slow)
aspect.indication: Proceed through diverging route, observing authorized speed through turnout(s) or crossover(s).

aspect.name: Approach Slow
aspect.indication: Proceed, approaching next signal at Slow Speed. Train exceeding Medium Speed must at once reduce to that speed.

aspect.name: Diverging Route Approach Slow (Medium)
aspect.indication: Proceed through diverging route, observing authorized speed through turnout(s) or crossover(s), then not exceeding Medium Speed, approach next signal at Slow Speed.

aspect.name: Diverging Route Approach Slow (Slow)
aspect.indication: Proceed through diverging route, observing authorized speed through turnout(s) or crossover(s), then not exceeding Medium Speed, approach next signal at Slow Speed.

aspect.name: Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed, preparing to stop at next signal. Train exceeding Medium Speed must at once reduce to that speed.

aspect.name: Diverging Route Approach (Medium)
aspect.indication: Proceed through diverging route, observing authorized speed through turnout(s) or crossover(s) preparing to stop at next signal. Train exceeding Medium Speed must at once reduce to that speed.

aspect.name: Diverging Route Approach (Slow)
aspect.indication: Proceed through diverging route, observing authorized speed through turnout(s) or crossover(s) preparing to stop at next signal. Train exceeding Medium Speed must at once reduce to that speed.
